item.description:
Hello NSBSN, Use coupon code: NSBS

Are you tired of trying to figure out the secrets to a winning social media strategy? Good news! We have rounded up 6 of the most respected experts in Social Media to help YOU put together the pieces of the social media puzzle. These experts are award winning, best-selling authors, speakers and trainers who have helped their clients achieve huge success using Blogging, Twitter, Facebook, YouTube, Linkedin and Pinterest.

This event is coming to you LIVE on October 25 in Danvers a the CoCo Key Hotel and if you sign up by 9/30 NorthShore Business Support Network members will receive $50 off the early bird rate and attend for just $97! http://www.eventbrite.com/event/3849796846/BIG/41874010510 (use coupon code NSBS)

The day is an information packed social media intensive from 8am - 5pm and in addition to the day of great speakers and valuable information, each participant will receive:

A digital copy of the best-selling book Solving the Social Media Puzzle: 7 Simple Steps to Planning a Social Media Strategy for your Business, PLUS the complementary workbook (a combined $40 value).
A blog and social media content calendar planner to help you organize your social media efforts
Top 50 blog ideas e-book to help get you on the way to writing a great blog for your business
365 Twitter Quotes, famous quotes on friendship, inspiration, success written in 140 characters or less, easily placed in Twitter

And MANY MORE worth over $200 -- all included in your ticket price!

The idea is that you leave that day with a workable and effective social media plan! So if you are a business owner, entrepreneur or marketer who:

Is tired of all the hype and wants REAL RESULTS
Wants to attract QUALIFIED customers using social media
Could use some guidance and FRESH ideas
Wants to make social media work FOR you rather than you working AT it

Join us for this amazing event--you will be happy you did! http://www.eventbrite.com/event/3849796846/BIG/41874010510 (use coupon code NSBS) To attend at the $97 price use coupon code NSBS.

Thank you and we look forward to seeing you all there!

group.name: The NorthShore Business Support Network meetup
